div.div:
style(color): enhance strong element with accent and font updates
- Update strong elements to use accent color, bolder font weight, and specify antique/system font families.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

feat: improve footnotes typography and styling
- Refine global typography so p, ol, ul inside footnotes aren’t forced to large font - Set sup elements to extra-small font size - Style section.footnotes with small text and insert a double-rule separator before it - Add a centered ❦ decorative pseudo-element above the footnotes list
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

docs: simplify tags and unify Linux guides
- Remove the “AI 最佳實務” tag from the LLM conversation guide, leaving only “LLM.” - Rename the Fedora-specific Git line ending consistency tutorial to a Linux-focused version, updating its title and description accordingly. - Add npm, pnpm, and Package Manager tags to the pnpm alias compatibility and pnpm vs npm advantage posts, and introduce the Package Manager tag to the uv sync and APT directory explainers. - Simplify the DevContainer sync guide’s taxonomy to include only zsh.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

feat(tags): enhance crypto articles with BTC and ETH tags
- Added "BTC" and "ETH" tags alongside "Cryptocurrency" to improve article categorization. - Add "ETH" to the tags list for improved categorization. - The tag BTC was added to the list of tags.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>
